Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: JG52Media
Reviews.Content: I did not purchase this camera from amazon, I got it at big lots on sale for $40, and it is amazing, the 720p quality is perfect, the camera by itself is worth at least $60, but it comes with a case, a faceplate, a bike mount, and you can use GoPro mounts or any other mounts for it. I love this camera so much and it shoots amazing video, and takes decent pictures, it has an LCD screen for playback, unlike the GoPro, only downside is audio doesn't play on the camera, but it does have amazing audio.I recorded this video with the camera[...]

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: Stacy Pyrek
Reviews.Content: I used this camera to shoot video underwater of my dog swimming.  VERY COOL!  Works great!  My friend has a go pro and she likes my camera better because it has a screen, which the go pro doesn't.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Vernon Knowles
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera for the price compared to a GoPro..I would recommend this camera to anyone that likes to save money

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: Awesome quality, videos came out great. Mounted on the front of bike and was awesome. The only thing I would say was that I had to get a different mount because it wasn't super stable and  a piece of the plastic broke off the mount

Reviews.Title: This little camera is Awesome
Reviews.Author: ken rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I wanted a gopro to capture videos on the trails but I just couldn't convince myself to spend 200+ bucks.So I found this little sucker for 40 bucks.  Outstanding for what it is.  The video is fairly good and it works well with the attachments included.  You do need to buy an SD card as mine came without one.Overall, good video with not so good sound (but good enough) and a price most can afford.

Reviews.Title: Bought them for our boys
Reviews.Author: rtgmom13
Reviews.Content: They have been using them on their bikes they can't wait to go skiing and use them in the Summer skim boarding.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Amber partridge
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a present so he could use it on his race sled and I had originally wanted the GoPro but after reading these ratings I decided to try this camera and we love it. The picture is so clear and love that there is a screen on the back to watch right on the camera. Will definitely recommend this camera to anyone that wants a good action camera for less than $300 that works just as good if not better than the GoPro brands.

Reviews.Title: worth every penny
Reviews.Author: McKinley R. Alvarez

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo35EQWC51O5OLLcurrentClick) { return cv_mo35EQWC51O5OLLcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:54 Minsthis camera is my favorite new toy! the video quality is great and the HD looks very nice on my 42" flat screen! cheap enough that when it falls off my skateboard, i'm not freaking out. This is a video i took with the camera attached to my skateboard and then a little hand-held action. of course it ends with me crashing, lol. As you can tell, this camera really takes a licking and still works! the only drawback is the weak mic, but for the price, i'm okay with it.

Reviews.Title: Great product and price!
Reviews.Author: Sophia Whitney
Reviews.Content: Very good customer service, quick response and very helpful! I purchased the camera for my 10 year old brother to use while riding his dirt bike. The helmet mount is easy to put on and very stable, he also used the bike mount for his bicycle. Great picture quality, and its really nice for him to be able to view the videos right on the camera after he takes them. Also takes still shots. So far it seems to be pretty durable, he had been using the waterproof case to protect the camera. Overall great product and a good price! Would definitely recommend it for a action camera!

Reviews.Title: Have no idea of the quality recording since it does not work
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: I had this item on my wish list and was happy to receive it for ym birthday. Upon taking it out of the package I noticed that it was not the best of quality, but then again I never expected it to be a GoPro. I followed the directions, plugged it in for a bit to charge and then unplugged it and pressed the power button. The display screen lit up and everything seemed ready for action. I then pressed the record button to take a sample video of my kids playing in the house and it did nothing. I then tried to switch modes and it did nothing. I figured maybe I would need to turn it off and back on so I pressed and held the power button and it did nothing! The thing is stuck "on" with the display screen showing everything I point it at, but it will not function in any way at all! I'm very dissapointed that my parents spent their money on this item and it does not work at all. Now to begin the amazon gift return process....

Reviews.Title: Great price for a decent camera
Reviews.Author: Stef
Reviews.Content: I got mine and I have field tested it on my boat. I needed a small waterproof camera to share the fun times with friends and family. The good part is that it comes with enough mounting gear to be fastened to moving vehicles. The quality of the pictures is pretty low, though. Even in full bright light the still pictures have a blue-ish tint to it and very strong jpeg compression creates lots of weird artifacts. The videos are not as bad as the sill pics but still very very grainy, makes me wonder if it's really using the HD resolution. I use only the highest resolution available. I also have an old but still much better Flip HD and that's where I draw the comparison.Would I suggest it to a friend? Only to budget conscious who just want to have a little fun.

Reviews.Title: Awful cheap brittle plastic-horrible video...
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 14 year old son for christmas, we mounted it on his bike and took off riding.. 500 feet down the road the mount broke, the plastic is incredibly cheap and thin.. After it broke we watched the video, it so jumpy and jittery and distorted that we couldnt stand to watch it... Horrible quality materials and horrible video..

Reviews.Title: does work no customer service
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift and had a very disappointed 17 year old on Christmas. After charging several hours the battery lasted less then 10 minutes. We have tried many times to charge it and same thing, dead within minutes.  Tried the customer help number and go no were. DO NOT BUY!

Reviews.Title: Why are they using GoPro footage from MicBegsma a well known GoPro Video Producer on YouTube
Reviews.Author: Charles H
Reviews.Content: Why don't they show footage from THEIR camera?Isn't their camera good enough to use for the advertisement?How about it GoActionCam.Video from YouTube./watch?v=V38do4dJgt0

Reviews.Title: Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: Flynn Schneider
Reviews.Content: DO NOT GET THIS PRODUCT! I got this camera because I need one for fishing and hunting videos. When I got it I thought I loved it but then i took it outside and made a short video and saw the quality. I thought that sucked but that wasn't the worst of it. Then I made a real hunting video and found that on a full charge you can only make a 15 minute video until the camera goes dead. DO NOT GET THIS PRODUCT!

Reviews.Title: Epic Fail for the price.
Reviews.Author: Defmex
Reviews.Content: This camera deserves a one due to quality, and stability. The overall camera is small which is a plus when using it for action, of course, but the material is really rather cheap. The buttons don't work well considering one I pushed in with little force and it stuck inside. The screen is convenient yet hard to see, but this all goes for what you pay for the camera! I purchased mine at work, working in retail I should know better than to spend my time on products that don't compare to the suppose capabilities. This camera is hard with focusing, I didn't try it under water only because I didn't trust the product enough to have a good seal protector, like the one it came with. I didn't want to loose my Micro SD card because of water damage. So, the product was a waste of time and money, luckily I could just return the product. Quality is a fail, video quality a fail, overall an Epic Fail

ProductInfo.Name: Emerson Go Action Cam 720p HD Digital Video Camera Pro Grade 5 mp Video With Screen WHITE
